text:
The fans have spoken, and country music's chosen Entertainer of the Year is an artist who's deserving, but not yet recognized during televised awards shows. Actually, several of the big winners in the 2018 Taste of Country Fan Choice Awards didn't get to sniff the ACM or CMA podiums.

So we make it right here. Fan vote is the only criteria used to decide the winners of this year's categories, including Song of the Year, Album of the Year and #RelationshipGoals Couple of the Year. Kane Brown didn't win the biggest prize, but he did win the most prizes. Lauren Alaina also had a strong showing with two wins. Brett Young, Cassadee Pope and "Blank Stares" singer Jay Allen took important categories, too, thanks to their fans.

Blake Shelton is this year's Entertainer of the Year. This category was heavily voted-on, but the singer and The Voice coach pulled ahead with one-third of the total votes, topping Brown and Keith Urban.

The most-voted-on category was Album of the Year. It was a close race, but when the clock hit 11:59ET, Brown's Experiment album had edged out Urban's Graffiti U by a very narrow margin. Likewise, Alaina and Alex Hopkins edged Brown and Katelyn Jae in the almost too-close-to-call Couple of 2018 category.

2018 Taste of Country Fan Choice Awards Winners:

#RelationshipGoals Couple of the Year

Brett Young + Taylor Mills

Carly Pearce + Michael Ray

Jason Aldean + Brittany

Kane Brown + Katelyn Jae

Keith Urban + Nicole Kidman

Kelsea Ballerini + Morgan Evans

Lauren Alaina + Alex Hopkins — WINNER!

Thomas Rhett + Lauren Akins

Most Passionate Fanbase of 2018

Scotty McCreery

Kane Brown — WINNER!

Miranda Lambert

Blake Shelton

Carrie Underwood

Luke Combs

Kip Moore

Eric Church

Most Jaw-Dropping Performance of 2018

Morgan Wallen, "Cover Me Up" for RISERS

Lindsay Ell, "Criminal" for RISERS

Kane Brown + Lauren Alaina, "What Ifs" at the ACMs — WINNER!

Carrie Underwood, "Cry Pretty" at the ACMs

Dan + Shay, "Tequila" at the CMAs

Ricky Skaggs Medley at the CMAs

Garth Brooks, "Stronger Than Me" at the CMAs

Reba McEntire + Kelly Clarkson, "Does He Love You" at the ACMs

Best Country Song of 2018

Brett Young, "Mercy" — WINNER!

Carrie Underwood, "Cry Pretty"

Dan + Shay, "Tequila"

Florida Georgia Line, "Simple"

Jason Aldean, Miranda Lambert, "Drowns the Whiskey"

Luke Bryan, "Most People are Good"

Morgan Wallen, "Up Down"

Pistol Annies, "Got My Name Changed Back"

Best Country Album of 2018

Ashley McBryde, Girl Going Nowhere

Carrie Underwood, Cry Pretty

Eric Church, Desperate Man

Kacey Musgraves, Golden Hour

Kane Brown, Experiment — WINNER!

Keith Urban, Graffiti U

Morgan Wallen, If I Know Me

Pistol Annies, Interstate Gospel

Top Indie Artist of 2018

Aaron Watson

Lucie Silvas

Garth Brooks

Dillon Carmichael

Cassadee Pope — WINNER!

Kelleigh Bannen

Jason Isbell

Margo Price

Viral Star of 2018

Walmart Boy Mason Ramsey

"Parked Out By the Lake" Singer Dean Summerwind

Singing Football Player Jackson Dean

"Blank Stares" Singer "Jay Allen — WINNER

Firefighter Marc Wright

Fan Choice Entertainer of the Year

Blake Shelton — WINNER!

Carrie Underwood

Dan + Shay

Eric Church

Garth Brooks

Kane Brown

Keith Urban

Luke Bryan
